comment:
This batch is to be split in two, one with chilli and the other vanilla.
Currently fermenting, OG was actually 1060?!

Oh, and obviously the Ancho was in the boil for 30 minutes, not days.
FG finished around 1020.
The Vanilla and Chipotle are now sitting in separate demijohns, reckon I will let them sit for seven days, not three. I will bottle the remaining 5 litres as a control batch for comparison.
